title: Faster Pace of Consolidation
description: Many small advisory firms will fare well, but Kestra Financial CEO James Poer says those resistant to affiliation or acquisition will struggle.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: Many small advisory firms will fare well, but Kestra Financial CEO James Poer says those resistant to affiliation or acquisition will struggle.
